Andy

John is one of the most professional engineers I’ve ever worked with. He takes the ownership of many OPS works, and documents them down with meticulous details. Also, he is a fast learner, and eager to pick up new skills. He also has very good project management skills, and I believe he could be a very good leader either in biz or eng departments.
